articles.content: The Bharti Hexacom IPO listing date has been fixed for Friday, April 12. For those who have been allocated shares, the crediting of shares to demat accounts will take place today, Wednesday, April 10… [+5214 chars]

articles.title: Mahindra XUV 3XO bookings open at dealerships ahead of launch - HT Auto
articles.description: Select Mahindra dealerships have unofficially begun accepting bookings for the subcompact SUV for a token amount of ₹21,000.
